title: Strengthening Language Learning Competencies Through Online Concept Mapping

context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology settings, with monthly face-to-face sessions held at the office

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate the ability to visualize core structures of language learning content using concept maps with 80% accuracy, as evidenced by weekly formative assessments
Learners improve behavioral, emotional, and cognitive engagement by over 40% over three weeks through concept map-based feedback
Learners demonstrate knowledge reconstruction ability by achieving a 90%+ submission rate of revised concept maps incorporating peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
